title: NVIDIA Awards up to $60,000 Research Fellowships to PhD Students
description: For 25 years, the NVIDIA Graduate Fellowship Program has supported graduate students doing outstanding work relevant to NVIDIA technologies. Today, the program announced the latest awards of up to $60,000 each to 10 Ph.D. students involved in research that sp…
